title: Developing Strategies for Integrating FAOBD Curriculum in TEFL Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental English language teaching methodologies and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Strategy development for current practitioners to effectively integrate FAOBD into English education

learning_goals: Learners can explain ≥3 educational use cases of FAOBD
Learners complete institutional FAOBD integration level checklists with ≥80% accuracy
Learners can develop learner competency diagnostic questionnaires for digital dictionary utilization
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
